document.title: Linking to Full Text in Scholarly Journals: Here a Link, There a Link, Everywhere a Link
document.abstract: Ovid [http://www.ovid.com] offers another example of internal linking with links between its bibliographic databases and the full text of articles available via Journals)Ovid, Ovid's aggregated fully SGML database of hundreds of scientific, technical, and medical journals. Again, depending on license agreements with Ovid, the searcher seamlessly moves from a link on a bibliographic record to the full text, never leaving the Ovid service.
document.publication-title: School of Information Sciences -- Faculty Publications and Other Works

field.name: comments
field.value: Searcher:Magazine for Database Professionals, November 2000, Vol.8(10), pp.36-45
